title: Bloomberg's McLoughlin on Gun Tax, McCormick on Trump (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's McLoughlin on Gun Tax, McCormick on Trump (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUESTS: Jennifer McLoughlin, tax reporter for Bloomberg BNA, on the debate shift in gun control: whether states and local tax laws can target firearms and ammunition. John McCormick, Bloomberg politics reporter, on the latest election polls, the state of the Trump campaign, and the Clinton campaign looking to court Republicans.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
